TownNPCMood_GoblinTinkerer.LikeBiome: Ahh, {BiomeName} is a nice, quiet place to construct more gadgets. Major like-age!
TownNPCMood_GoblinTinkerer.DislikeBiome: I don't like {BiomeName}, it is filled with loud, annoying pests that get in the way of my work!
TownNPCMood_GoblinTinkerer.HateBiome: I hate {BiomeName}, I cannot put merge these trinkets into one piece if I'm fighting to keep myself that way!
TownNPCMood_GoblinTinkerer.LikeNPC: {NPCName} understands how fun it is to mix things together, I can respect that!
TownNPCMood_GoblinTinkerer.LoveNPC: {NPCName} makes my cardiac core function improperly, it appears I love how that feels!
TownNPCMood_GoblinTinkerer.DislikeNPC: I detect eerie vibes from {NPCName}, as if they contain dark secrets. I don't like the feeling.
TownNPCMood_GoblinTinkerer.HateNPC: I really hate how {NPCName} humiliated me, all because male goblins cannot grow real hair!
TownNPCMood_GoblinTinkerer.LikeNPC_Princess: {NPCName} likes my inventions, and says all friendly goblins are welcome!

TownNPCMood_WitchDoctor.NoHome: A hut would suffice. Not all of my surroundings embrace tranquility.
TownNPCMood_WitchDoctor.FarFromHome: I have strayed far from my calm place.
TownNPCMood_WitchDoctor.DislikeCrowded: The close presence of others disrupts my juju and comfort.
TownNPCMood_WitchDoctor.HateCrowded: Too many of your kind are gathering too near, growing much malice in my soul.
TownNPCMood_WitchDoctor.LoveSpace: Strong energy flows through unimpeded by neighboring presence, very pleasant.
TownNPCMood_WitchDoctor.LikeBiome: I cannot fathom existing elsewhere, {BiomeName} is the center of my voodoo spirits.
TownNPCMood_WitchDoctor.DislikeBiome: The magicks of {BiomeName} are of oppression, not true purity, my heart and soul are enraged.
TownNPCMood_WitchDoctor.HateBiome: I sense a grim evil pervading the land and all living things in {BiomeName}.
TownNPCMood_WitchDoctor.LikeNPC: {NPCName} is a kindred spirit of nature, my soul is at peace in their presence.
TownNPCMood_WitchDoctor.DislikeNPC: I dislike the practices of {NPCName}. True healing cannot come from metal and glass.
TownNPCMood_WitchDoctor.HateNPC: Fury fills my being as abominations sprout from tainted earth - I speak of {NPCName}.
TownNPCMood_WitchDoctor.LikeNPC_Princess: Kind to my people, {NPCName} is. Much appreciated.

TownNPCMood_Clothier.NoHome: No home at all? I will not be subjected to criminal abuse!
TownNPCMood_Clothier.FarFromHome: It's a highly tedious procedure, cranking out a spyglass and looking for my house.
TownNPCMood_Clothier.DislikeCrowded: The local population is like living with dead weight on my back.
TownNPCMood_Clothier.LoveSpace: I'm not a popular man, but I know what tranquility is.
TownNPCMood_Clothier.LikeBiome: Seeing is believing, but sometimes the most likeable things are in {BiomeName}.
TownNPCMood_Clothier.DislikeBiome: There just aren't enough dark rooms in {BiomeName}.
TownNPCMood_Clothier.HateBiome: My soul feels torn here in {BiomeName}, as if my very being is at war between good and evil.
TownNPCMood_Clothier.LikeNPC: I can't quite place it, but I find {NPCName} fascinating.
TownNPCMood_Clothier.LoveNPC: {NPCName}? I hadn't seen anything so delicious in my life.
TownNPCMood_Clothier.DislikeNPC: For some reason, being around {NPCName} makes me feel uneasy.
TownNPCMood_Clothier.HateNPC: I hate {NPCName} and I don't know why.
TownNPCMood_Clothier.LikeNPC_Princess: There's no greater joy than seen through the eyes of {NPCName}!

TownNPCMood_Mechanic.Content: Everything's working correctly - oh, me? Yeah I'm fine!
TownNPCMood_Mechanic.NoHome: I need some sort of structure to run these wires through.
TownNPCMood_Mechanic.FarFromHome: Oh, it seems I'm out of signal range! Hmm.
TownNPCMood_Mechanic.DislikeCrowded: The flickering lights are bothering me. Is there a load on the grid?
TownNPCMood_Mechanic.HateCrowded: I'm going to need a way bigger power source for THIS MANY people, I hate it!
TownNPCMood_Mechanic.LoveSpace: Perfect, no one is in the way for building infrastructure.
TownNPCMood_Mechanic.LikeBiome: I like {BiomeName}, machines don't overheat here, and the energy flow is efficient.
TownNPCMood_Mechanic.DislikeBiome: I don't like {BiomeName}, it reminds me of a traumatic experience!
TownNPCMood_Mechanic.HateBiome: I feel extremely uncomfortable in {BiomeName}, as if creeping eyes are always watching me.
TownNPCMood_Mechanic.LikeNPC: I feel like I understand {NPCName} better than anyone else.
TownNPCMood_Mechanic.LoveNPC: Umm... {NPCName} makes my heart flutter, I need to get that checked!
TownNPCMood_Mechanic.DislikeNPC: I don't really like that {NPCName} won't leave me alone!
TownNPCMood_Mechanic.HateNPC: I hate how {NPCName} doesn't know how to treat a woman!
TownNPCMood_Mechanic.LikeNPC_Princess: {NPCName} hotwired one of my pumps, I'm super impressed!

TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.Content: What? I AM in a good mood.
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.NoHome: How can a man of my riches have no home? Preposterous!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.FarFromHome: Bah! I'm trying to make my way back home to count my money. Begone!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.DislikeCrowded: I'll have you know, I dislike neighbors!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.HateCrowded: Go tell all these miserable poor freeloaders to scram, I hate crowds.
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.LoveSpace: Finally, isolation from all these miserable peasants!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.LikeBiome: Living in {BiomeName} forces people to stay indoors and leave me alone. I find that pleasant.
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.DislikeBiome: What kind of irritating place is {BiomeName}? Poppycock, I tell you!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.HateBiome: Even for my standard, {BiomeName} is beyond miserable! Bah!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.LikeNPC: Exuberant people tend to give me a headache, but somehow I actually like {NPCName}. I must be losing my mind!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.LoveNPC: I highly admire {NPCName}. Anyone who knows the true value of money earns my utmost respect!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.DislikeNPC: {NPCName} is just too noisy, away with them and their ilk!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.HateNPC: I loathe the very existence of {NPCName}! What kind of lunatic just gives things away for free?
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.LikeNPC_Princess: {NPCName} shouldn't pay taxes, she's the princess... but she insisted.

TownNPCMood_Pirate.Content: Yarr. I be in ship shape!
TownNPCMood_Pirate.NoHome: The open sea's me true home, but if I be landlocked for awhile... well I need me shelter, matey.
TownNPCMood_Pirate.FarFromHome: Me bed and me rum be callin' me name back home.
TownNPCMood_Pirate.DislikeCrowded: Avast! Too many landlubbers on me ship be foulin' my mood.
TownNPCMood_Pirate.HateCrowded: Ye too hate the feelin' that a mutiny be comin'? Too many scallywags gettin' close to me quarters.
TownNPCMood_Pirate.LoveSpace: 'Tis like having me very own galleon, matey!
TownNPCMood_Pirate.LikeBiome: Hardy har har, matey, {BiomeName} is me true home!
TownNPCMood_Pirate.DislikeBiome: Argh, {BiomeName} be a bit cramped for me style, ye scurvy dog!
TownNPCMood_Pirate.HateBiome: Arr, {BiomeName} be the foulest chunk 'o dry land ever traversed!
TownNPCMood_Pirate.LikeNPC: Har Har! Melikes how {NPCName} brings ye best bottle o' rum.
TownNPCMood_Pirate.LoveNPC: Ahoy, me takes {NPCName} under me wing, landlubber. Me love raisin' sea pups!
TownNPCMood_Pirate.DislikeNPC: Ye know me don't like that {NPCName} tries to cut me beard, I've slit scurvy throats fer less!
TownNPCMood_Pirate.HateNPC: Me want to make {NPCName} walk ye plank, sea dog! Hate the coddlin' and the dastardly smell!
TownNPCMood_Pirate.LikeNPC_Princess: Yarr, {NPCName}'d fetch a hefty reward on the seas... jus' kidding, she's me favorite lass.

TownNPCMood_Wizard.NoHome: Where is my house? Where am I? Who are you? Who am I?
TownNPCMood_Wizard.FarFromHome: I could have sworn my house was here somewhere...
TownNPCMood_Wizard.DislikeCrowded: Can some of these noisy people move further away? No? Ok.
TownNPCMood_Wizard.HateCrowded: This overcrowding is starting to dampen my magic! I think.
TownNPCMood_Wizard.LoveSpace: Reminds me of the old days, practicing magic up in a tower in the middle of nowhere!
TownNPCMood_Wizard.LikeBiome: What's not to like about {BiomeName}? It has unicorns and rainbows.
TownNPCMood_Wizard.DislikeBiome: I dislike {BiomeName}, magic does not flow well in a place like this.
TownNPCMood_Wizard.HateBiome: The abominations in {BiomeName} disturb me, like the darkest form of magic.
TownNPCMood_Wizard.LikeNPC: {NPCName} and I share a very long history, I like the mutual wisdom.
TownNPCMood_Wizard.LoveNPC: I love that there's a lot to talk about with {NPCName}.
TownNPCMood_Wizard.DislikeNPC: {NPCName} dabbles in things that shouldn't be disturbed, and I don't like that.
TownNPCMood_Wizard.HateNPC: That loathsome {NPCName} is a complete and total abomination to magic!
TownNPCMood_Wizard.LikeNPC_Princess: {NPCName}? We have a princess? Fascinating, she seems nice.

TownNPCMood_Steampunker.NoHome: I could use a flat to bide in.
TownNPCMood_Steampunker.FarFromHome: I'm wee far from home, an' I forgot my bloody motor!
TownNPCMood_Steampunker.DislikeCrowded: I dinnae like being surrounded by folk, much.
TownNPCMood_Steampunker.HateCrowded: Oi, I absolutely hate crowded quarters!
TownNPCMood_Steampunker.LoveSpace: Plenty o' room just for me and some good steam engines!
TownNPCMood_Steampunker.LikeBiome: I prefer the wide open spaces here in {BiomeName}, great for jetpack joyrides!
TownNPCMood_Steampunker.DislikeBiome: The shrubbery and mess of {BiomeName} really grinds my gears!
TownNPCMood_Steampunker.HateBiome: Truly, {BiomeName} is uncultured and unsightly - nevermind perilous!
TownNPCMood_Steampunker.LikeNPC: {NPCName} is a likeable sort who helps me spruce up my inventions.
TownNPCMood_Steampunker.LoveNPC: I love how unique and interesting {NPCName} truly is, remarkable!
TownNPCMood_Steampunker.DislikeNPC: {NPCName} is too otherworldly! I dinnae like them much.
TownNPCMood_Steampunker.LikeNPC_Princess: The jolly {NPCName} volunteered to try my new teleporter, I love an enthusiastic assistant!

TownNPCMood_Cyborg.Content: All neural functions appear to be operating smoothly.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.FarFromHome: I have wandered beyond the signal range of my datacenter.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.DislikeCrowded: Too many other lifeforms. I am experiencing negative emotional neural patterns.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.HateCrowded: Lifeform limit exceeded. Neural functions overloaded. Translation: I hate this.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.LoveSpace: Zero close proximity life signs detected. This is fortunate.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.LikeBiome: My cybernetic functions perform optimally in {BiomeName}'s temperature gradient. This is a plus.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.DislikeBiome: The flora and fauna are invading my synthetic exoskeleton: {BiomeName} is an undesired location for myself.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.HateBiome: Detecting overwhelming numbers of hostile life signatures in {BiomeName}.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.LikeNPC: {NPCName} attempts to treat me favorably like another human. It appears I appreciate that.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.DislikeNPC: {NPCName} does not comprehend my existence, for it deviates from the norm. Unusual. The negative feeling is mutual.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.HateNPC: {NPCName}'s functions cannot be scientifically analyzed. Neutral functions overloaded. Translation: I hate this.
TownNPCMood_Cyborg.LikeNPC_Princess: {NPCName} analyzed: Most wholesome carbon lifeform ever recorded.

TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.NoHome: I can't just go back to the north pole when I please, ho ho ho! Think you can spot me a temporary house?
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.FarFromHome: Hello there! I'm far from my temporary home!
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.DislikeCrowded: I prefer to work alone, in the presence of just my elves. I dislike all the distractions!
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.HateCrowded: This is a pretty big crowd, each and every one on the naughty list. I hate carrying that heavy bag of coal!
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.LoveSpace: Ho ho ho! Just me and my elves, a perfect place for my remote workshop.
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.LoveBiome: I absolutely love it here! Are you surprised? Who thought I wouldn't like {BiomeName}?
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.HateBiome: I'm adding you to the naughty list for putting me in a awful place like {BiomeName}.
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.HateNPC: I hate people who don't believe in me! For example, {NPCName}, the naughtiest I've ever known!
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.LikeNPC_Princess: Ho ho ho, {NPCName} is most certainly on top of the nice list.

TownNPCMood_Golfer.NoHome: I need a place to hang up my clubs.
TownNPCMood_Golfer.FarFromHome: I think I've wandered off course. That is not a smart move.
TownNPCMood_Golfer.DislikeCrowded: Golf is a sport best enjoyed solo. I dislike my life not being the same way.
TownNPCMood_Golfer.HateCrowded: Hate to say it, but I rather hate all the foot traffic here.
TownNPCMood_Golfer.LoveSpace: Nothing better than having all this space to yourself.
TownNPCMood_Golfer.LikeBiome: I like {BiomeName}. It has all the necessary features for golfing.
TownNPCMood_Golfer.DislikeBiome: Tell me something. How am I supposed to golf in a place like {BiomeName}?
TownNPCMood_Golfer.HateBiome: I especially think it's unwise to hang around a place like {BiomeName}.
TownNPCMood_Golfer.LikeNPC: It's always fun to hang out with {NPCName}. Good people.
TownNPCMood_Golfer.LoveNPC: Unpopular opinion: I quite love having {NPCName} around. I get my water hazards returned to me!
TownNPCMood_Golfer.DislikeNPC: I dislike being around {NPCName}. Makes me feel uneasy.
TownNPCMood_Golfer.HateNPC: I hate {NPCName}'s greedy attitude. It's pretty unnecessary in a world like this.
TownNPCMood_Golfer.LikeNPC_Princess: I tried to teach {NPCName} a few slick golf tricks, but she schooled me instead! I like her.

TownNPCMood_Truffle.NoHome: I need a place to feel secure and welcome.
TownNPCMood_Truffle.FarFromHome: I don't think I'm comfortable being so far away from my home.
TownNPCMood_Truffle.DislikeCrowded: I don't like this anxiety I'm getting from the people gathering around me.
TownNPCMood_Truffle.HateCrowded: I hate it. So many people... I... I'm not going to get eaten, right?
TownNPCMood_Truffle.LoveSpace: I love having so mush room to myself. What's so funny?
TownNPCMood_Truffle.LikeBiome: I feel right at home, like I am one with {BiomeName} biome.
TownNPCMood_Truffle.HateBiome: I don't belong in {BiomeName}, I would not survive!
TownNPCMood_Truffle.LikeNPC: {NPCName} treats me with respect, as though I'm a true part of nature. I don't know how to feel about that, except I like it.
TownNPCMood_Truffle.LoveNPC: I love {NPCName} for being able to talk to me without mysteriously getting hungry.
TownNPCMood_Truffle.DislikeNPC: {NPCName} has tried to eat me so many times. I swear, one time they weren't even human! I, obviously, dislike it.
TownNPCMood_Truffle.HateNPC: {NPCName} has tried to throw me into a pot filled with other unusual ingredients. I hate that.
TownNPCMood_Truffle.LikeNPC_Princess: {NPCName} doesn't try to eat me, that's good in my book.

TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.Content: I'm feeling good, actually! Thanks for askin'!
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.NoHome: Like, I can't just go live in a burrow, you know. I need a house!
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.FarFromHome: I'm uh, like, a little homesick? Plus I need to feed my pets!
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.DislikeCrowded: I get a little anxious around a lot of people. I like, don't want that.
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.HateCrowded: Eek! I hate feeling worried about what will happen with all these people around!
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.LoveSpace: I absolutely love having my own place to be myself! This is like, totally awesome!
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.LikeBiome: I love animals, so naturally {BiomeName} is like, the best place ever! Yas!
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.DislikeBiome: It's like, weird having instincts and all, and {BiomeName} really makes me want to run away!
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.HateBiome: Like, {BiomeName} totally reeks of those curses that fox cub had -- the one that bit me!
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.LikeNPC: Of course I like {NPCName}! I like, knew them since I was born!
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.LoveNPC: I can't explain it. I have like, a thing for {NPCName}. Is it because of the tail?
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.DislikeNPC: I don't like how cruel {NPCName} is!
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.HateNPC: I really totally hate what {NPCName} does to animals!
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirl.LikeNPC_Princess: Like, {NPCName} has her subjects searching for a way for me to break my fox curse! Yass!

TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirlTransformed.FarFromHome: Grrawr... home! far FAR! CANNOT TRACK.
TownNPCMood_BestiaryGirlTransformed.LikeBiome: In {BiomeName}... Good RUN! PLAY! HUNT! Yee!

TownNPCMood_Princess.Content: All matters are well at hand, my loyal subject!
TownNPCMood_Princess.NoHome: It seems I'm without any lodgings. If I may, have anything in pink, please?
TownNPCMood_Princess.FarFromHome: Um... I seem to have wandered a bit far! Care for a lovely stroll?
TownNPCMood_Princess.DislikeCrowded: It brings me joy residing by my subjects. I understand others may find that unappealing, however.
TownNPCMood_Princess.HateCrowded: I LOVE being surrounded by others, but I wish not to see them so unhappy with overcrowding.
TownNPCMood_Princess.HateLonely: Um... I'm feeling a little lonesome, may I please reside closer to my people?
TownNPCMood_Princess.LikeBiome: Flowers are pleasant, hills are lovely, sand is warm. Every place is beautiful when you are among friends!
TownNPCMood_Princess.HateBiome: Mmm! This place could use a makeover, for sure. It's not quite fit for anyone, let alone royalty!
TownNPCMood_Princess.HateNPC: I just can't bring myself to hate {NPCName}.
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_Nurse: {NPCName} always makes me feel better when I'm hurt!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_Merchant: {NPCName} always provides what I need, free of charge!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_Dryad: {NPCName} is so in touch with nature, I love it!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_ArmsDealer: {NPCName} is such a softie at heart!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_Clothier: {NPCName} seems so sad sometimes, but he's very nice to me!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_Wizard: {NPCName} is so wise, I trust his judgement completely!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_Mechanic: {NPCName} can fix up just about anything, I admire her!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_SantaClaus: {NPCName} is so jolly, I just want to give him a gift!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_Steampunker: {NPCName} is my favorite tea time partner!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_DyeTrader: {NPCName} always helps me choose the best color dresses!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_PartyGirl: {NPCName} is always the life of the party!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_Cyborg: {NPCName} is so cool, he seems to know everything!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_Painter: {NPCName} really brightens up this place with his art!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_WitchDoctor: {NPCName} offers such unique insights, it really makes me think!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_Pirate: {NPCName} is always good for an exciting pirate story!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_Stylist: {NPCName} has the best hair advice, she's great to talk to!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_Angler: {NPCName} is such a nice boy, always offering to take me fishing!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_TaxCollector: {NPCName} is terribly misunderstood, he's very kind to me!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_DD2Bartender: {NPCName} is from an entirely different world, that's so interesting!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_BestiaryGirl: {NPCName} always lets me play with her pets, its so nice!
TownNPCMood_Princess.LoveNPC_Princess: {NPCName} is a little unsettling to be around, but terribly cute!
